price: (96) Indeed, those upon whom the word [i.e., decree] of your Lord has come into effect will not believe,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
